callback_with_context.context_function_id: CanPerformRitual && IsActive == false && StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^3").IsPlayerOwned && IsRitualCategoryActive == false && IsLocalPlayersTurn && IsComplete == false

property.name: available
property.value: CanPerformRitual && IsActive == false && IsRitualCategoryActive == false && StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^2").IsPlayerOwned && IsComplete == false

available.name: available
available.tooltip: The Ritual of Rebirth is available!

completed.name: completed
completed.tooltip: The Ritual of Rebirth has been completed for this forest.

ongoing.name: ongoing
ongoing.tooltip: The Ritual of Rebirth is in progress. Ensure the settlement is under your control when the Ritual completes to receive additional rewards.

ongoing_other_rebirth.name: ongoing_other_rebirth
ongoing_other_rebirth.tooltip: You cannot start a Ritual of Rebirth while another is currently active.

unavailable_region.name: unavailable_region
unavailable_region.tooltip: You must control this Magical Forest to initiate the Ritual of Rebirth here.

unavailable_resources.name: unavailable_resources
unavailable_resources.tooltip: This Magical Forest requires further healing before the Ritual of Rebirth can be performed.

button_ritual_panel.componentleveltooltip: Ritual not possible â€“ you do not own this settlement

property.name: available
property.value: CanPerformRitual && IsActive == false && IsRitualCategoryActive == false && StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^4").IsPlayerOwned && IsLocalPlayersTurn && IsComplete == false

property.name: ongoing_other_rebirth
property.value: IsActive == false && IsRitualCategoryActive && IsLocalPlayersTurn && IsComplete == false

property.name: unavailable_resources
property.value: CanPerformRitual == false && StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^4").IsPlayerOwned && IsLocalPlayersTurn && IsComplete == false && IsComplete == false

available.name: available
available.tooltip: The Ritual of Rebirth is available!

completed.name: completed
completed.tooltip: The Ritual of Rebirth has been completed for this forest.

not_local_players_turn.name: not_local_players_turn
not_local_players_turn.tooltip: You cannot start a Ritual of Rebirth during another player's turn

ongoing.name: ongoing
ongoing.tooltip: The Ritual of Rebirth is in progress. Ensure the settlement is under your control when the Ritual completes to receive additional rewards.

ongoing_other_rebirth.name: ongoing_other_rebirth
ongoing_other_rebirth.tooltip: You cannot start a Ritual of Rebirth while another is currently active.

unavailable_region.name: unavailable_region
unavailable_region.tooltip: Ritual not possible as you do not own this settlement

unavailable_resources.name: unavailable_resources
unavailable_resources.tooltip: This Magical Forest requires further healing before the Ritual of Rebirth can be performed.

property.name: inactive_no_valid_army
property.value: IsContextValid(SelectedCharacter.MilitaryForceContext) == false || (CanPerformRitual(SelectedCharacter.MilitaryForceContext) == false && IsOnCooldown == false && IsScriptLocked == false && IsLocalPlayersTurn)

hover.name: hover
hover.tooltip: Click to instantly transport the selected army to this Magical Forest via the Deeproots.

inactive_no_valid_army.name: inactive_no_valid_army
inactive_no_valid_army.tooltip: To use the Deeproots to travel to this Magical Forest, first select an army within another forest, then click here.

inactive_not_players_turn.name: inactive_not_players_turn
inactive_not_players_turn.tooltip: The Deeproots are unavailable when it is not your turn.

inactive_on_cooldown.name: inactive_on_cooldown
inactive_on_cooldown.tooltip: The Deeproots are currently inaccessible due to recent use.

frame_in_progress.comment: show only when button state is In_progress

property.name: available
property.value: CanPerformRitual && IsActive == false && IsRitualCategoryActive == false && StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^2").IsPlayerOwned && IsComplete == false

property.name: unavailable
property.value: (CanPerformRitual == false && StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^2").IsPlayerOwned && IsComplete == false) || (StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement", "ritual_panel", "^2").IsPlayerOwned == false && IsComplete == false)
